# About
Dr. Matthias König is a researcher and educator at Humboldt-Universität zu Berlin and University Stuttgart, where he leads the *Systems Medicine of the Liver* group. His work focuses on computational modeling, pharmacokinetics, and digital health education. He is passionate about making complex biomedical processes understandable and accessible through open, interactive learning resources.
